DOC.brief_summary: Malignant cells frequently produce many tumor growth factors to autocidal or endocrinal proliferate growth, metastasis,or angiogenesis about tumor cells. By studying tumor growth factors in hepatocellular carcinoma, one may know the tumor behavior, its relationship with clinical manifestation or invasion, and could be used as diagnostic or prognostic tools.This study aims to study the relationship between tumor growth factors in HCC ant its clinical relevance.
DOC.brief_title: Tumor Growth Factors in Hepatocellular Carcinoma
DOC.detailed_description: The clinical relevance of patients will be evaluated by the concentrations of tumor growth factors.
DOC.criteria: Histology proven HCC No definitely diagnosed tumor
